description: Possible race condition can occur due to lack of synchronization mechanism when On-Device Logging node open twice concurrently in Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Voice & Music

product.name: Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Industrial IOT, Snapdragon Mobile, Snapdragon Voice & Music
